an4.65:1: "Cattārome, bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ. Katame cattāro? Rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno, ghosappamāṇo ghosappasanno, lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno, dhammappamāṇo dhammappasanno –
an4.65:2: Ye ca rūpe pamāṇiṁsu,ye ca ghosena anvagū;Chandarāgavasūpetā,nābhijānanti te janā.
an4.65:3: Ajjhattañca na jānāti,bahiddhā ca na passati;Samantāvaraṇo bālo,sa ve ghosena vuyhati.
an4.65:4: Ajjhattañca na jānāti,bahiddhā ca vipassati;Bahiddhā phaladassāvī,sopi ghosena vuyhati.
an4.65:5: Ajjhattañca pajānāti,bahiddhā ca vipassati;Vinīvaraṇadassāvī,na so ghosena vuyhatī"ti.
